mapper.insert: insert into user_table (user_idx, user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_postal_code, user_addr1, user_addr2) values (user_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_postal_code}, #{user_addr1}, #{user_addr2})
mapper.select: select user_idx from user_table where user_id = #{user_id} and user_pw = #{user_pw}
